tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had an consultstion with Dr Shivaprasad BM for pain in teeth 4 months back.
He explained about the problem well & he suggested  for rootcanal & implant treatment. 
The treatment was done very well and i have no complaints till date.
Well experienced, hygenic & advance treatmemt.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was first Root canal treatment of my son. He was apprehensive about the pain, but to his surprise it was absolutely painless. The whole treatment was explained to him and it was a pleasent experience for him. Dr Shivprasad has an expert hand and is a thorough professional, very friendly.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Shivaprasad is a very experienced dentist and attends to the root cause of the issue. He is very calm and ensures that the patient is completely satisfied with the treatment. I am very happy with the care taken by the doctor and his team. Thank you very much....

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Brilliant doc extremely well qualified knows his job. 
Very confident and sure of his deliverable s extremely patient and cautious.
Works in risky situations of diabetes etc and super confident .
I’m extremely happy and grateful for the implants and their success.
Very hygiene continua and clean dependable, inexpensive expert service!! Thank you !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Shivaprasad comes with an overall quality experience in the field of dentistry. He listens to our problems and also is so patient in explaining the root cause of it and provides the exact solution needed. My family including myself, my parents, sister, daughter and husband all visit him for any of our tooth related problems and we all have our treatments done perfectly. The appointments are scheduled and tracked properly so that we don't have a long wait time. The clinic is maintained as well as equipped which gives patients a positive environment as soon as we enter.  Dr.Maheshwari is also an excellent doctor and so friendly. We definitely recommend Tooth priority for 100% dental care.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words ..it keeps us motivated..

review:
Dr. Shiva Prasad is professional, competent and friendly. Easy appointments, approachable. More than a doctor, he becomes a personal friend. I strongly recommend him. He keeps himself updated by attending various workshops and seminars.
We consulted him for my wife's tooth implants.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Maheshwari has handled my orthodontic braces case for over a year. I have seen a significant difference from last year to now. Her methods have proven to be effective, and she has good experience in the field. Having her husband, who is also a dentist, by her side, they both provide a complete package for any dental related issue.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Wonderful experience with Tooth Priority Family Dental care. Dr. Shivaprasad was a wonderful surgeon, and the staff was always helpful and kind. They ensured I had a braces and gap closing treatment, and follow-up. I am so glad I chose Tooth Priority Family Dental Care and I would highly recommend to anyone.
